p: In addition to the base oils described above, the following plants were used to produce macerates: sage ( Salvia officinalis L.), thyme ( Thymus vulgaris L.), and basil ( Ocimum basilicum L.). Macerates were prepared separately for each herb. Any raw material with morphological changes or pathogen damages was eliminated.
